name: chiffchaff
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small green-brown bird that is a type of warbler: In the trees overhead a number of chiffchaffs were performing their unmistakable two-note song. The ravines are alive with warblers, including the chiffchaff and willow warbler.
More examplesFewer examplesWe stood beneath the trees and heard our first chiffchaff of the year: "Chiff-chaff-chiff-chaff-chiff-chiff-chaff."In recent years the winters there have been so warm that many chiffchaffs no longer migrate.In contrast to the chiffchaff 's repetitive, rather tuneless ditty, the willow warbler sings a musical, plaintive tune.They saw a variety of birds, such as swallows, skylarks and chiffchaffs.
